value:
$WmMPID_ブノワ,ch05_56_Benoit_M_Normal,Face|I like animals. They aren't scared
of me.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Cool|How many of these guys are there?!
They just keep coming!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|They must have arrived while
we were investigating the tower.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Their reinforcements seem almost
endless! If we don't retreat now...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Stay focused, everyone! When we
have an opening to get clear, take it!$k$p$Sbs150|

$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Enemies! Wait—who's that?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|That lance-work... It couldn't be!$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Zacharias! Where did you come from?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Are you here to help us? Wow!
What incredible timing!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|...That is not why I'm here. If
anything, I've come to ask for
your help.$k$pNiðavellir's army... Fáfnir has
invaded the Emblian Empire.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What? He escaped from Askr?!$k$pI-is Princess Veronica all right?!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|She's managed to hold them off
somehow, but it's only a matter of
time before she's overwhelmed.$k$pI'm well aware we are in no position
to ask favors of you, but... Please,
help Veronica. Help my sister.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Zacharias, you've been away,
so you may not know this, but...$k$pDespite her initial aggression toward
Askr, Veronica has cooperated with
us on many an occasion.$k$pWe will respond as we would if any
ally were in trouble. We will not
abandon her to Niðavellir...$k$pEveryone—Embla is in need!
We must hurry to their aid!$k$p$Sbs150|
